message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and importance to both of us, I propose a price of $9500 for it. This offer reflects my commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while maximizing my earnings.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $8800. This price reflects my budget constraints and the value I believe the product can bring to me. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I need to stay within my means.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In light of this, I would like to propose a compromise at $9000 for the product. This price still allows me to maintain a reasonable profit while being mindful of your financial situation. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $8500 for the product. I believe this price is fair and reasonable, considering the value I'll get from the product.
